summary: The single package-delivery woman Dora lives a somewhat reclusive life in a high-rise in Leipzig and gets through everyday life with her dry sense of humor. But her quiet, well-ordered life... See full summary »
cast: Dagmar Manzel|Grazyna Szapolowska|Jörg Schüttauf|Berndt Stübner|Ramona Kunze-Libnow|Helge Lang|Detlef Kapplusch|Kirsten Block|Matthias Brenner|Simone Kabst|Frank Auerbach|Marcus Kaloff|Wolfgang Boos|Marylu Poolman|Daniel Schröder|Svea Meiken Petersen
title: Nachbarinnen
